line.comment: * Export outpost product and waste. No import.
* Import outpost resource. We use the same $export value.
* Export mining crystals, minerals and e-cells. No import.
* Import laser / shield / missile components (base 3 million).

sval.val: Export outpost product and waste. No import.
Import outpost resource. We use the same $export value.
Export mining crystals, minerals and e-cells. No import.
Import laser / shield / missile components (base 3 million).
